Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_neun39JnPq1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/11cQPl7"><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/3d04b6bf83cc46d9b1db747486208e15/tumblr_inline_neupdcxJZ91rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p><strong>BahamutoD</strong> presents <a href="http://bit.ly/11cQPl7"><strong>ADJUSTABLE LANDING GEAR</strong></a>, a part pack consisting of two types of landing gears (single and two-wheel) and can be tweaked to your heart’s content via sliders. There’s more details to it, including the use of the Firespitter wheel module, so make sure you get all the details <a href="http://bit.ly/11cQPl7"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

*Sees image*

*Drools all over keyboard*

ME WANTY! (But I don't have Firespitter )

Ah, well.

+1 to make this a stock thing!

About time we got new landing gear, and I'm glad this time it was BahamutoD. It looks like the were made for B9, though. Someone needs to do an alternative, stock-a-like mod.

Either that or SQUAD could update the single model we've had since 0.15.

This is stockalike enough. B9 isn't that far off from stock style, either (now that "stock style" isn't hideous, at least for planes), so small parts mesh well with it. Besides, just look at the picture.
I would have taken more landing gear but this is outstanding.

About time we got new landing gear, and I'm glad this time it was BahamutoD. It looks like the were made for B9, though. Someone needs to do an alternative, stock-a-like mod.

Either that or SQUAD could update the single model we've had since 0.15.

Yeah, it's a little old, isn't it?
I wish we had this as stock

I would have taken more landing gear but this is outstanding.

This is all the landing gear you'll ever need.
This or equivalent should be stock.
Please update 10-version-old airplane gears!

This is all the landing gear you'll ever need.

I could think of a few more configurations, but that would be the exception, not the rule. These will cover most cases with Mk2 and even Mk1 parts.

For example, the Dream Chaser wheels open from the sides. It's visual, not functional, but it would still be nice to have. Functionally these amazing wheels should fill every need though.

Edited November 11, 2014 by Alshain
Looks good! +1 To get this into stock.
So by featuring this mod on the blog does it mean you're looking to make it stock?
Does this pack need any other mods to function? My laptop isnt the best, I have only a few mods yet it still crashes the game regularly

Does this pack need any other mods to function? My laptop isnt the best, I have only a few mods yet it still crashes the game regularly

Just the Firespitter plugin. It comes with its own animation plugin as well (it's needed), but both are lightweight.

So by featuring this mod on the blog does it mean you're looking to make it stock?

I wouldn't hold your breath.
If you are open to suggestions, Id like to suggest Internally stowed landing gear, maybe in a module or something

....

I wouldn't hold your breath.

Don't worry .... I'm not. I swore off mods after the last "incident".

Just not sure why the Dev's would choose to highlight mods that show off the shortcomings of the game at this state.
love it...
I just wish it could move the craft it was on.

Don't worry .... I'm not. I swore off mods after the last "incident".

Just not sure why the Dev's would choose to highlight mods that show off the shortcomings of the game at this state.

They choose to highlight mods that show off the ingenuity and skill of their fans.
